instruction: Explain why human judgement is important in computer programming.
output: Humans are necessary in numerous aspects of computer programming in order to ensure that the code is of sufficient quality for production. Human judgement is important in order to filter out potential bugs, determine if considerations for edge cases and special cases are handled properly, and to ensure the code is written in a readable and efficient manner. It can also help ensure that the code is written according to industry standards and best practices. Human judgement is also important to ensure that the code can satisfy the customer’s desired functional requirements. Finally, human judgement helps prevent any future maintenance issues. In summary, human judgement is a critical factor for creating high-quality code for production.
